Decks, Timber & Concrete Floors - Home Renovation Business for Sale Ref: 9615
business.description:
**Potential
Potential is a word that is often misused in today's world. However this business has an abundance of potential. Let me show you.
We have been in this business since 2003. Because we do a good job all our work comes from word of mouth and referrals. Friends of our clients see the floors we have done and ask who did the job and that's how we get our name out there. Sometimes we have to knock back work because we can't fit it all in.
On top of that we pay an annual fee of $250.00 to receive a steady flow of requests to quote for our services. Why bother doing that you might ask when we have enough work, well I like the security of knowing I can get extra work if I need it.
**Timber floors and Stairs
This business is in a prime position to take advantage of the booming home renovating frenzy currently taking hold of Brisbane. There are so many floors out there that constantly need re-sanding and polishing. An average timber floor can be sanded six times during its life time.
**Decks
Decks are hugely popular now and they are getting bigger every year. Almost every house has some sort of deck attached to it and they constantly need attention. On average a deck should be coated every two years. Re-coats are quick, easy and profitable.
**Concrete Garage floors
There are lots of brick and tile houses that have no timber floors but even then there is an opportunity for our business to get some work. We can transform their dull concrete garage floors into a more usable space by applying one of our spectacular epoxy floors that are great looking, easy to clean, oil and paint resistant and best of all they are easy to do.
**Web Page
We haven't got one. Obviously a good stand-alone web page would generate more business inquiries.
**Future
This business would suit either someone looking to work for themselves and earn a good income or someone who wants to take a more management type role and employ staff. Either way there is a great base to start from.
**Best Bit
We have accountant's figures from 2003. Last financial year shows sales of $195,000 with expenses at $58,000 and we are on track to do the same this financial year. Harry has a copy of the latest figures.
**Reason for sale
I am 59 this year, I have worked hard for a long time and I need a break.
**Conclusion
After talking to Harry, our broker, we have reduced the price substantially to generate some interest in the business. We are keen to sell and move onto the next stage of our lives.
Please contact Harry 0434 344 282 with any question you have.
Price reduced to $77,000 + SAV $5,000.
Broker: Harry Notaras 0434 344 282/ harry@absbrisbane.com Head Office: 07 3368 4010/reception@absbrisbane.com
